entries.name: Steve Caddle, MD, MPH
entries.department: Department of Pediatrics Division of Pediatric Child and Adolescent Medicine
entries.title: Attending Physician
entries.title-details: The attending physician is the head doctor in charge of your childâ€™s care. He/she will work with specialists and staff to provide excellent care while you are in the hospital.
entries.bio: Clinical interests include type 1 diabetes and metabolic syndrome. His research interest is the insulin pump. He is an avid follower of the NY Giants.
